en.SetDelay:
*Delay for new spreads* ‚Äî This is the delay time for sending newly found spreads\. It is needed to filter out fleeting spreads that quickly disappear\.

*Please, enter the time in seconds or minutes* \(e\.g\. 2 seconds or 1 min\):
